column4: If you create two swap partitions for each instance of Ubuntu you want to install on a single drive, will each instance use their own swap partition you specify? Or will they just use all avaliable ones they find?
Swap partitions are configured to be used in /etc/fstab.
Just make sure that each installation has only one swap partition, its own, configured in /etc/fstab.
So I can configure each instances /etc/fstab to just use the swap partition they were assigned?
